section.p: The Problem List Section contains data on the problems currently being monitored for the patient.

ol.li: Conforms to IHE Active Problems Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.6)

SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Condition (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.7)
Conforms to CCD Problem Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.11)
